headline: Hormel Foods (HRL): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength and Long-Term Underperformance
summary: Hormel Foods (HRL) has quietly outperformed over the past month, even as its longer term chart still looks bruised. That combination is drawing in investors hunting for stable cash flows. See our latest analysis for Hormel Foods. That recent strength sits against a tougher backdrop, with the share price at $23.66 and a clear disconnect between a solid 30 day share price return and a deeply negative multi year total shareholder return that signals sentiment may only just be turning. If Hormel...
